Okey this one is just like this author always does just hella confusing from my understanding with mtl she goes to a party get's smashed and then raped then at the end of that the rapists takes a bunch of pictures and sends it to everyone. Rumours spreads to at the school that she's a slut and then she cries in her room. BF comes over and asks her why she cheated on him, she tells him she was raped upon which he asks why she didn't report it or go to the police she doesn't really answer this but just evades it until the bf get's mad believing she cheated on him and slaps her. She cries and starts masturbating then rapist turns up and she half-heartedly tries to fight him of but he just laughs and also ask why she never reported him. Then they just start having sex and why she never reported him was never made clear. Even though during the first rape she kept thinking it hurts it hurts and someone please help me. But I guess h-logic kicked in that after rape and became rapists slave...
